name: World Greetings Quiz / Test | Languages | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what language might you be greeted with the word "Bonjour"?
If someone greeted you with the words "nin hao ma", which language would they be speaking?
Speakers of which language might greet you with the words "buenos días"?
In what language might you be greeted with the word "kalimera"?
If someone greeted you with the words "namaste" or "namaskar", which language would they be speaking?
Speakers of which language might greet you with the words "kunjani"?
If someone greeted you with the word "buongiorno", which language would they be speaking?
In what language might you be greeted with the word "konnichiwa"?
Speakers of which language might greet you with the word "aloha"?
If you were greeted with the words "Hey, how are you?" what language would your speaker be using?
